member.name: IPlayToManagerInterop.GetForWindow
member.summary: Gets the PlayToManager instance for the specified window.
member.param: The window to get the PlayToManager instance for.
The reference ID of the specified window.
The PlayToManager instance for the specified window.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPlayToManagerInterop.ShowPlayToUIForWindow
member.summary: Displays the Play To UI for the specified window.
member.param: The window to show the Play To UI for.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPlayToManagerInterop
member.summary: Enables access to PlayToManager methods in a Windows Store app that manages multiple windows.
